Prev Next ALLAHABAD, HOT STUFF RESTAURANT
Allahabad
Ad Type: Offer
0 comments - Be the first to comment!
HOT STUFF RESTAURANT has served Indian, Continental, Chinese, Fast Food dishes. It has offer Recorded Music, Ice Cream Parlour etc. It is Centrally Airconditioned and It is open from 10.30 a..m. to 10.30 p.m. It is Situated in posh Civil Lines Shopping Area. This Restaurant seating capacity is fifty eight people respectively. It accept BOB, VISA, Master cards.
